text: Mr. Pacman is an American pop music band from Colorado. They use sounds from old video games to create their music. Mr. Pacman has recorded 2 CDs & made 4 music videos. ==Other websites== * http://myspace.com/mrpacman/ - official website Category:American pop music groups Category:Electronic music groups Category:Musical groups from Denver Category:Musical groups established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Colorado
title: Mr. Pacman
